title: Pam Wilson
deck: I grew up in Belfast but at age 18 went to study in Edinburgh, where I met my husband John. Weâ€™ve lived in York since 1983 and have 3 grown up children - two sons and a daughter - and four grandchildren. I also get involved in various church-related activities alongside John in his role as elder. I love to see people finding their place in Gateway and encouraged to use their gifts. My hobbies include swimming, walking and opera and I love to travel.
words: Reflections from John and Pam's Sabbatical
